question: WTA Cincinnati - Rybakina vs. Swiatek
description:
This is a polymarket on the Semifinal match between Elena Rybakina and Iga Swiatek in the 2025 WTA Cincinnati women’s singles tournament, scheduled for August 17, 2025.

This market will resolve to "Rybakina" if Elena Rybakina advances against Iga Swiatek.
This market will resolve to "Swiatek" if Iga Swiatek advances against Elena Rybakina.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond August 21, 2025, without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50–50.

If the match ends in a walkover (one player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for August 18 at 7:10PM ET:
If the Baltimore Orioles win, the market will resolve to “Orioles”.
If the Boston Red Sox win, the market will resolve to “Red Sox”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.
